name: LLM-Powered Call Agent Integration System
description: Enterprise-level AI agent system integrating LLMs with real-time call transcription and automated decision making. Built a comprehensive workflow where LLMs process client-specific prompts and execute appropriate actions based on conversation context. Features FastAPI backend with WebSocket support, SIP configuration for automated call handling, LiveKit integration for real-time audio processing, and OpenAI API for intelligent transcription and response generation.
shortDescription: Real-time AI call agent with LLM decision-making and automated workflows

name: Real Estate Price Prediction
description: Machine learning project focused on predicting real estate prices using advanced regression techniques. Features comprehensive EDA, data cleaning, and interactive visualizations.
shortDescription: ML-based real estate price prediction with interactive visualizations

name: Real-Time Chess Helper using YOLOv8
description: Built a robust real-time chessboard state recognition system using YOLOv8, capable of detecting and classifying chess pieces from live camera feeds at over 30 FPS. Achieved 98.7% mAP@50 IoU on diverse chessboard configurations.
shortDescription: AI-powered chess analysis and training tool

name: Gender, Nationality & Emotion Detection
description: Deep learning system that simultaneously detects gender, nationality, and emotion from facial images using convolutional neural networks (CNN). Achieved 98%+ accuracy in multi-class detection.
shortDescription: CNN-based facial analysis system with 98%+ accuracy

name: Personal Portfolio Website
description: Modern, responsive portfolio website built with Next.js, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS. Features dark mode, smooth animations, and optimized performance.
shortDescription: Modern portfolio website with Next.js and Tailwind CSS

name: Planto.ai VS Code Extension
description: Developed a comprehensive VS Code extension for Planto.ai that revolutionizes the coding experience by providing context-aware AI assistance embedded directly in the development environment. The extension features intelligent auto-completion, screenshot-to-UI code conversion, Figma-to-code transformation, and seamless integration with backend schemas for automated code generation. Built with a focus on scalability and team collaboration, supporting large development teams with advanced workflow management.
shortDescription: AI-powered VS Code extension with context-aware coding assistance and visual-to-code automation

name: Data Science Capstone Project
description: Comprehensive data science project involving end-to-end machine learning pipeline, from data collection to model deployment.
